Waste.type: Mandatory:Text, Resource type. In this case fixed to 'Waste'
Waste.name: Mandatory:Text, Waste Name. Example 'Green glass bottle'
Waste.description: Optional:Text, Waste description. Example 'Bottle made of green glass'
Waste.refCategory: Mandatory:Text, Reference to category entity this belongs. Example [wastecategory:9]
Waste.definitionSource: Optional:Text, Where this characterization comes from

WasteCategory.type: Mandatory:Text, Resource category type. In this case fixed to 'WasteCategory'
WasteCategory.name: Mandatory:Text, WasteCategory Name. Example 'Glass bottles'
WasteCategory.description: Optional:Text, WasteCategory description. Example 'Glass bottles including whiteand green glass'

SortingType.family: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. In this case fixed to 'ResourceCollection'
SortingType.type: Mandatory:Text, Resource collection subtype. In this case fxed to 'SortingType'
SortingType.name: Mandatory:Text, SortingType Name. Example 'Color Glass collection'
SortingType.nameLocal: Optional:Text, SortingType name in the local language.
SortingType.description: Optional:Text, SortingType description. Example 'Collection of colored glass bottles'
SortingType.descriptionLocal: Optional:Text, SortingType description in the local language.
SortingType.regulation: Optional:Text, Regulation under which the SortingType is operating.
SortingType.refResources: Mandatory:List<ID>, List of waste entities composing the SortingType. Example [waste:6, waste18]
SortingType.shape: Optional:Text, If the shape of the container is very relevant or representative for the sorting type (mainly for the sorting game) specify the shape of the container. Accepted values: the shapes provided by the sorting game.
SortingType.color: Mandatory:Text, Sorting type's associated color. Example 'Green'
SortingType.annotations: Optional:Text, Attribute reserved for annotations (incidences, remarks, etc.)
SortingType.areaServed: Optional:Text, Higher level area to which the sorting type belongs to. It can be used to define the area where the sorting type is applied, etc.

Transaction.refEmitter: Mandatory:Text, Transaction's emitter entity containing an Agent ID.
Transaction.refReceiver: Mandatory:Text, Transaction's receiver entity containing an Agent ID.
Transaction.refCapturer: Optional:Text, Reference to the Id of the Device entity if exists, that captured the transaction containing an Agent ID..
Transaction.date: Mandatory:Text, Timestamp which represents when the transaction was made
Transaction.refTransferredResources: Optional:Text, List of Resource IDs transferred in this transaction.
Transaction.transferredLoad: Optional:Text, Load transferred in this transaction (Sum of all the resources transferrer = In this load amount we know that the cited resources exist but no in which percentage each)

Vehicle.vehiclePlateIdentifier: Mandatory:Text, The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) is a unique serial number used by the automotive industry to identify individual motor vehicles.
Vehicle.name: Optional:Text,
Vehicle.location: Optional:GeoJSON, Vehicle's location represented by a GeoJSON Point
Vehicle.refType: Mandatory:Text, Reference to the VehicleType it belongs
Vehicle.category: Optional:Text, Vehicle category(ies) from an external point of view. This is different than the vehicle type (car, lorry, etc.) represented by the `vehicleType` property. (`public`, `private`, `municipalServices`, `specialUsage`,`tracked`, `nonTracked`)
Vehicle.speed: Optional:Number, Denotes the magnitude of the horizontal component of the vehicle's current velocity and is specified in Kilometers per Hour. If provided, the value of the speed attribute must be a non-negative real number. `null` *MAY* be used if `speed` is transiently unknown for some reason.
Vehicle.cargoWeight: Optional:Number, Current weight of the vehicle's cargo
Vehicle.purchaseDate: Optional:Date, The date the item e.g. vehicle was purchased by the current owner.
Vehicle.mileageFromOdometer: Optional:Number, The total distance travelled by the particular vehicle since its initial production, as read from its odometer.
Vehicle.vehicleConfiguration: Optional:Text,A short text indicating the configuration of the vehicle, e.g. '5dr hatchback ST 2.5 MT 225 hp' or 'limited edition'
Vehicle.features: Optional:Text, (`gps`, `airbag`, `overspeed`, `abs`, `wifi`, `backCamera`, `proximitySensor`, `disabledRamp`, `alarm`, `internetConnection`)  or any other needed by the application.
Vehicle.serviceProvided: Optional:Text, `garbageCollection`, `parksAndGardens`, `construction`, `streetLighting`, `roadSignalling`,`cargoTransport`, `urbanTransit`, `maintenance`, `streetCleaning`, `wasteContainerCleaning`, `auxiliaryServices`,`goodsSelling`,  `fairground`, `specialTransport`) or any other value needed by an specific application.
Vehicle.vehicleSpecialUsage: Optional:Text, Indicates whether the vehicle is been used for special purposes, like commercial rental, driving school, or as a taxi. The legislation in many countries requires this information to be revealed when offering a car for sale. (`taxi`, `ambulance`, `police`, `fireBrigade`, `schoolTransportation`, `military`)
Vehicle.areaServed: Optional:Text, Higher level area served by this vehicle. It can be used to group vehicles per responsible, district, neighbourhood, etc.
Vehicle.serviceStatus: Optional:Text, Vehicle status (from the point of view of the service provided). 'parked','onRoute','broken',etc.

VehicleType.refInputs: Mandatory:Text, Reference to the list of Input Resource entities. List of structured values containing entity id and a unit of estimated quantity per day.
VehicleType.refOutputs: Mandatory:Text, Reference to the list of Output Resource entities. List of structured values containing entity id and a unit of estimated quantity per day.
VehicleType.name: Mandatory:Text, Name given to the vehicle type
VehicleType.vehicleType: Mandatory:Text, Type of vehicle from the point of view of its characteristics. 'car','truck',etc.
VehicleType.numberOfAxes: Optional:Number, Number of axes the vehicle has
VehicleType.loadType: Optional:Text, Back','Side', etc. loading type of the waste into the vehicle

DepositPoint.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to DepositPoint
DepositPoint.serialNumber: Optional:Number, Serial number of the container
DepositPoint.refSortingType: Mandatory:Text, Reference to the sorting type entity
DepositPoint.refType: Mandatory:Text, Reference to the DepositPointType entity.
DepositPoint.storedWasteOrigin: Optional:Text, Origin of the waste stored (household, municipal, industrial, construction, hostelry, agriculture, other)
DepositPoint.location: Mandatory:GEOJson, Container's location represented by a GeoJSON Point.
DepositPoint.address: Optional:Text, Civic address where the container is located.
DepositPoint.fillingLevel: Optional:Number, Filling level of the container (percentage, expressed in parts per one). When the container is full it must be equal to `1.0`. When the container is empty it must be equal to `0.0`. If it is not possible to determine the current filling level it must be equal to `null`.
DepositPoint.cargoWeight: Optional:Number, Weight of the container load.
DepositPoint.methaneConcentration: Optional:Number, Methane (CH4) concentration inside the container.
DepositPoint.regulation: Optional:Text, Regulation under which the container is operating.
DepositPoint.responsible: Optional:Text, Responsible for the container, i.e. entity in charge of actuating (emptying, collecting etc.).
DepositPoint.dateServiceStarted: Optional:Text, Date at which the container started giving service.
DepositPoint.dateLastEmptying: Optional:Text, Timestamp which represents when the container was emptied last time.
DepositPoint.nextActuationDeadline: Optional:Text, Deadline for next actuation to be performed (emptying, picking up, etc.).
DepositPoint.actuationHours: Optional:Text, Hours suitable for performing actuations over the container.
DepositPoint.openingHours: Optional:Text, Hours when the point is available.
DepositPoint.dateLastCleaning: Optional:Text, When the container was cleaned last time.
DepositPoint.refDepositPointIsle: Optional:Text, Reference to DepositPointIsle where the container is placed if any.
DepositPoint.status: Optional:Text, Mandatory:Text, Container's status from the point of view of safety.
DepositPoint.image: Optional:Text, URL containing a photo of the container.
DepositPoint.annotations: Optional:Text, Field reserved for annotations (incidences, remarks, etc.).
DepositPoint.areaServed: Optional:Text, Higher level area to which the container belongs to. It can be used to group containers per responsible, district, neighbourhood, etc.
DepositPoint.dateModified: Optional:Text, Last update timestamp of this entity
DepositPoint.refDevice: Optional:Text, Reference to the device(s) used to monitor this container.

DepositPointType.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to DepositPointType
DepositPointType.name: Mandatory:Text, Deposit Point Trype name
DepositPointType.width: Mandatory:Number, Width of the collection container, bag, etc.
DepositPointType.height: Mandatory:Number, Height of the collection container, bag, etc.
DepositPointType.depth: Mandatory:Number, depth of the collection container, bag, etc.
DepositPointType.weight: Mandatory:Number, Weight of the collection container, bag, etc.
DepositPointType.cargoVolume: Mandatory:Number, Total volume the point can hold.
DepositPointType.maximumLoad: Mandatory:Number, Maximum load the point can hold safely.
DepositPointType.recommendedLoad: Mandatory:Number, Manufacturer recommended load for the points.
DepositPointType.category: Mandatory:Text, Deposit Point category (`trashCan`,`bulk`,`wheelieBin`,`bag`,`fixed collection centers`,`mobile collection centers`,`underground`. Container is placed underground,`pneumatic`. Pneumatic collection boxes.,`portable`. Container can be moved around a certain extent.`fixed`. Container is fixed to a wall, support or handle.)
DepositPointType.insertHolesNumber: Mandatory:Number, Number of insert holes the container has.
DepositPointType.insertHoleWidth: Optional:Number, Width of the hole or lid.
DepositPointType.insertHoleHeight: Optional:Number, Height of the hole or lid.
DepositPointType.madeOf: Optional:Text, Material the container is made of.
DepositPointType.madeOfCode: Optional:Text, Material Code as per standard tables.
DepositPointType.colors: Optional:List, Available colors, even if it is transparent for inside visibility.
DepositPointType.image: Optional:Text, URL containing a photo of the container type.
DepositPointType.compliantWith: Optional:List, list of standards to which the container is compliant with (ex. `UNE-EN 840-2:2013`)
DepositPointType.accessLimitation: Optional:Text, Access limitation type to the container type. Example lock
DepositPointType.userIdentification: Optional:Text, User identification type to the deposit point type(`nfc`,`rfid`,`qr code`)
DepositPointType.inputControl: Optional:Text, Input control type of the container type. (`chamber`,`weight`,`volume`)
DepositPointType.maximumInputVolume: Optional:Number, Maximum volume a user can deposit.

DepositPointIsle.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to DepositPointIsle
DepositPointIsle.location: Optional:Text, Mandatory:GeoJson, Location of the isle represented by a GeoJSON Polygon.
DepositPointIsle.address: Optional:Text, Civic address where the isle is located.
DepositPointIsle.name: Optional:Text, DepositPointIsle name
DepositPointIsle.features: Mandatory:Text, list of features provided by the isle (`containerFix`: Allows to fix containers to a permanent position. `fenced`. The isle is properly fenced. `locked`. Locked isle, where a lock needs to be opened for ac-cessing. (Implies being fenced). `underground`. The isle allows to hold buried containers.
DepositPointIsle.areaServed: Optional:Text, Higher level area to which the isle belongs to. It can be used to group isles per responsible, district, neighbourhood, etc.
DepositPointIsle.dateModified: Optional:Text, Last update timestamp of this entity.
DepositPointIsle.dateCreated: Optional:Text, Creation timestamp of the isle (This might different than the entity creation time)

Route.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to Route
Route.shortName: Mandatory:Text, Short name of a route, often short and abstract indetifier like 7,34 or Blue that riders use to indetify a route
Route.longName: Optional:Text, Full name of a route, more descrptive than the short name an often include the route's destination or stop
Route.refAssignedVehicle: Optional:Text, ID of the assigned vehicle
Route.departurePoint: Optional:Text, Departure location represented by a GeoJSON Point
Route.scheduledDeparture: Optional:Text, Itineray's scheduled path geometry represented by a GeoJSON LineString
Route.departureTimestamp: Optional:Text, Timestamp which captures when the user started the trip segment
Route.arrivalPoint: Optional:Text, Arrival location represented by a GeoJSON Point
Route.scheduledArrival: Optional:Text, Performed path of the vehicle, to be updated while vehicle is traveling. A geometry represented by a GeoJSON Linestring
Route.arrivalTimestamp: Optional:Text, Timestamp which captures when the user arrival the trip segment
Route.stops: Mandatory:JSON, Json array with the structured fields of the stops.
Route.refAgency: Optional:Text, agent this route operated by
Route.color: Optional:Text, Color that corresponds to the route. The color must be provided as a six-character hexadecimal number, for example, 00FFFF.
Route.url: Optional:Text, The URL of a web page about that particual route

TargetGroup.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to TargetGroup
TargetGroup.name: Text:Mandatory, TargetGroup Name. Example Domestic Generator
TargetGroup.acronym: Text:Mandatory, TargetGroup Acronym Example Domestic Generator

WasteManagmentStage.type: Mandatory:Text, Entity Type. Fixed to WasteManagmentStage
WasteManagmentStage.name: Text:Mandatory, Name of the Waste Management Stage. Example Prevention
